official-title.#text:
To establish the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage
		  Conservation Council Advisory Committee to advise the Secretaries of the
		  Interior and Agriculture on wildlife and habitat conservation, hunting,
		  recreational shooting, and for other purposes.

Wildlife and
			 Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee

Wildlife and
				Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (in this section referred to as the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council
				Advisory Committee
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and

on
				wildlife and habitat conservation, hunting, and recreational shooting.

shall advise the
				Secretaries with regard to—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee

quote.#text:
to facilitate the expansion
				and enhancement of hunting opportunities and the management of game species and
				their habitat

text.#text:
implementation of
				Executive Order No. 13443: Facilitation of Hunting Heritage and Wildlife
				Conservation, which directs Federal agencies

policies or
				programs to recruit and retain new hunters and shooters;

policies or
				programs that increase public awareness of the importance of wildlife
				conservation and the social and economic benefits of recreational hunting and
				shooting; and

policies or
				programs that encourage coordination among the public, the hunting and shooting
				sports community, wildlife conservation groups, and States, tribes, and the
				Federal Government.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall consist of no more than 16 discretionary members and 7 ex
				officio members.

The tourism,

The discretionary members shall be appointed jointly by
				the Secretaries from at least one of each of the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, and the organization each
				individual represents, actively support and promote sustainable-use hunting,
				wildlife conservation, and recreational shooting.

Prior to the appointment of the
				discretionary members, the Secretaries shall determine that all individuals
				nominated for appointment to the

shall be appointed for a term of 4 years. Members shall not
				be appointed for more than 3 consecutive or nonconsecutive terms.

6
